message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a price of $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, especially considering its worth to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I am willing to pay $13,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something closer to my initial asking price. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,500?
I understand your position, Alice. I am still committed to finding a fair price. I would like to propose $13,200 for the product.
